title: Tien Sin
description: A basic Thai vegetarian eatery located 30 meters from Charoen Krung Rd. Order by choose and point at the counter. Sells a wide selection of mock meats to buy for home cooking. Directions: Take exit 4 of Saphan Taksin rail station, take 1st left on to Charoen Krung, then take 2nd street on the right (Thanon Si Wiang), and it's approx. 30m on your left.
streetAddress: Thanon Si Wiang, off Charoen Krung Rd
